trans-unit.resname: MED·WS2 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, CARDNAME is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便是4/4，具不灭异能的人类／士兵生物，且仍然是鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MED·WS2 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME during your turn.
trans-unit.target: 防止于你的回合中将对CARDNAME造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MED·WS2 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：选择警戒，系命或不灭。至多另一个目标由你操控的生物获得该异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MED·WS2 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 4
MED·WS6 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Name
MED·WS6 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME具有战场上所有其他鹏洛客的所有忠诚异能。

trans-unit.resname: MED·WS6 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
trans-unit.target: +1：你抓一张牌。每位对手各放逐一张手牌或一个由其操控的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: MED·WS6 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 3
MED·WS6 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.
trans-unit.target: −8：每位未操控传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客的对手各输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA7 | Domri, Chaos Bringer | Card Name
MED·RA7 | Domri, Chaos Bringer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains riot. (It enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
trans-unit.target: +1：加{R}或{G}。如果该法术力用以支付生物咒语，则它获得起事异能。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA7 | Domri, Chaos Bringer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: -3：检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中至多两张生物牌，并将它们置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA7 | Domri, Chaos Bringer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each end step, create a 4/4 red and green Beast creature token with trample."
trans-unit.target: −8：你获得具有「在每个结束步骤开始时，派出一个4/4，红绿双色，具践踏异能的野兽衍生生物」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA8 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Name
MED·RA8 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: +1：将至多两张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌放逐。如果以此法放逐了至少一张生物牌，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA8 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.
trans-unit.target: −1：放逐目标法术力值等于或小于1的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: MED·RA8 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−5]: CARDNAME deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: −5：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于放逐区中由该牌手拥有之牌的数量，且你获得等量的生命。
